question: Who is the author of the book 'Fire and Fury Corps -- Saga of Valour, Fortitude and Sacrifice'?
explanation: The book titled \'Fire and Fury Corps -- Saga of Valour, Fortitude and Sacrifice\' has been authored by Northern Army Commander Lieutenant General Ranbir Singh. The  book is showcasing the history and achievements of the Fire and Fury Corps which guards the Line of Control (LoC) and Line of Actual Control (LAC) in Ladakh region of Jammu and Kashmir (J&K). It documents the courage and bravery of the Fire and Fury Warriors and portrays the rich heritage and ethos of the Indian Army. The book also covers the serenity and mysticism of Ladakh and its people, as a tribute to the symbiotic relationship shared by the Indian Army and the people of Ladakh region.
